about_the_game:
This app includes the following:

1) Official Digital Artbook of "Slitterhead" with commentary by Keiichiro Toyama: "The Art of Slitterhead"
2) Official Digital Soundtrack of "Slitterhead" composed and written by Akira Yamaoka (10 tracks)

*Artbook and soundtrack are only available in English and Japanese.
*Please refer to the online manual regarding the storage location of the above data.

content_descriptors.notes:
This app includes a digital artbook, with concept art and designs from the game "Slitterhead".

While Slitterhead shows sexual acts, nudity, violence, murder, suicide, depictions of blood, criminal activity, and the consumption of alcohol and cigarettes, this artbook does not graphically depict the above to full extent. However, please be aware that the text commentary by the Creative Director does mention these elements.
